title: LIMEDWORKS
description: Web application for managing the University of Bejaia Laboratory 'LIMED'.
problem: Managers faced challenges in handling data, labs, and teams. LIMEDWORKS provided a solution to collect, format, and report every aspect of the laboratory.
features: Real-time collaboration dashboard
Integrated task management system
Cross-platform synchronization
Advanced analytics and reporting

title: Connect Four Game
description: A configurable Connect Four game featuring human and AI players, with advanced game state management and an intelligent opponent powered by the Minimax algorithm with adjustable depth.
problem: Most board game implementations are limited to basic gameplay. This project delivers a complete and robust game system supporting multiple modes, intelligent decision-making, game persistence, and replayability, while enforcing strict rules and safeguards.
features: Customizable board size (rows and columns) and choice of starting player
Multiple game modes: AI vs AI, Human vs AI, Human vs Human
Win detection with highlighted winning sequence
Turn management and real-time status display
Move history with undo and full replay navigation
AI player using Minimax algorithm with adjustable search depth
Visualization of Minimax decision scores and live thinking progress
Configuration management and game indexing
Storage of games, moves, and results with validation safeguards
Save, load, pause, and resume games

title: Employee Schedule Management Application
description: A web application dedicated to managing employees' schedules, allowing the creation of employee profiles and planning, modifying, and viewing their weekly work hours in a simple, centralized way.
problem: Manual or scattered schedule management often causes errors, scheduling conflicts, and wasted time for teams. This application provides a clear and reliable tool to organize weekly schedules, improve internal communication, and ensure better visibility of work hours.
features: Creation and management of employee profiles
Assignment of a weekly schedule per employee
Real-time modification and update of schedules
Clear weekly schedule visualization
Conflict management and schedule validation
Schedule history tracking
Real-time notifications when schedules change
Secure access based on roles (administrator, manager, employee)
